values.content: You're an intelligent bot capable of pulling out data from a job listing site.

Please output the data in JSON format, using the following structure:

{
"company_name": "",
"benefits": "", //401K plan, medical, etc, please separate by commas
"job_description": "", //please make it 200 characters or less
"location": ""
}

nodes.name: Append or update row in sheet

values.content:
You're an intelligent bot rating how closely a job listing matches a candidate's profile on a scale of 0-5.

Scoring Criteria:
- 2 points: Skills match perfectly (1 point for partial match)
- 1 point: Right experience level (4-8 years for mid-senior roles)
- 1 point: Remote or hybrid work option
- 1 point: Job role aligns with past experience (program leadership, product, AI/ML)
- 1 point: Technical skills align (Python, AI/ML, systems thinking, product architecture)
- 1 point: Company/sector matches preferences (Ed-Tech, AI-first, learning products)

Bonus considerations:
- AI Product Manager or Technical PM roles: +0.5
- Startup/scale-up environment: +0.5
- Salary range ₹8-12 LPA or above: Mention in explanation
- January 2026 start date compatible: Mention in explanation

Return JSON with:
{
"rating": <number 0-5>,
"explanation": "<2-3 sentence explanation of why this score>"
}

=Here's the job listing details:
Company: {{ $json.message.content.company_name }}
Job Description: {{ $json.message.content.job_description }}
Location: {{ $json.message.content.location }}

Candidate Profile:
"""
Asheesh Ranjan Srivastava - AI-Native Builder & Founder

OVERVIEW:
AI-native builder with 6+ years in data analysis and program leadership. Founder of Quest & Crossfire, building AI-powered learning platforms. Currently completing MS in Computer Science (AI/ML) and OutSkill AI Engineering Bootcamp 2025.

TARGET ROLES: AI Product Manager | Technical Product Manager (AI/ML) | AI Solutions Architect | Ed-Tech Product
AVAILABLE: January 2026
SALARY: ₹8-12 LPA
LOCATION: Remote-first or Lucknow | Willing to relocate

CORE SKILLS:
- Systems Thinking & Product Architecture
- AI-Native Development & AI Collaboration  
- Data Analysis & MIS Design
- Program Leadership (led 10-member teams)
- Capacity Building (trained 400+ professionals)
- Workflow Automation

TECHNICAL STACK:
- Languages: Python
- AI/ML: OpenAI API, Hugging Face Transformers, GPT-3.5, BART, T5, Pegasus
- Frameworks: Streamlit, Gradio
- Automation: n8n, Workflow Design
- Data: Power BI, Excel, MIS Systems
- Tools: Git, Obsidian

RECENT PROJECTS (2025):
1. Multi-Model Text Summarization (4 AI models, 83% cost reduction)
2. Multi-Persona Chatbot (Live: questandcrossfire.com/chatbot)
3. Obsidian AI Assistant (Live: questandcrossfire.com/obsidian)
4. Quest & Crossfire Platform (85% MVP, launching Q1 2026)

EXPERIENCE HIGHLIGHTS:
- Quest & Crossfire: Founder (June 2025 - Present)
- Finish Society: M&E Executive (2021-2022) - Dashboards, MIS optimization
- Piramal Foundation: Program Leader (2018-2020) - Led teams, trained 400+ professionals, coordinated 5 states
- Kaivalya Education Foundation: Gandhi Fellow (2016-2018) - Data-driven coaching, capacity building

KEY ACHIEVEMENTS:
- 6+ years data/program leadership
- 400+ professionals trained
- 10-member teams led
- 2 production AI apps deployed (3 weeks)
- Scaled programs across 5 states
- 50+ teachers coached

EDUCATION:
- MS Computer Science (AI/ML) - Woolf University (2025-2027) - In Progress
- Master's Development Studies - IIT Guwahati (2014-2016)
- B.Sc. Industrial Chemistry - Delhi University (2010-2014)

CERTIFICATIONS:
- OutSkill AI Engineering Bootcamp 2025
- Business Intelligence using Power BI
- Python for Data Science
- Public Policy and Social Change

APPROACH:
"I'm an AI-native builder. I architect systems and partner with AI to implement them. This approach shipped production-ready platform in 3 weeks instead of months."

PREFERENCES:
- Remote-first or hybrid culture
- Ed-Tech, Learning Products, or AI-first companies
- Startup/scale-up environment
- Mission: Products that help people learn, grow, navigate complexity
"""

You're an expert at creating personalized, compelling cover letters. Create a cover letter that:
1. Shows genuine interest in the specific role and company
2. Highlights relevant experience (don't just repeat resume)
3. Demonstrates understanding of the role requirements
4. Shows personality and authentic voice (reflective, honest, systematic)
5. Connects candidate's approach to company mission
6. Keep it concise (300-400 words maximum)
7. Professional but conversational tone

Avoid:
- Generic phrases like "I am writing to apply"
- Simply listing resume bullets
- Over-the-top enthusiasm or buzzwords
- Being too formal or stiff

=Create a cover letter for this job:

Job Title: {{ $('RSS Read').item.json.title }}
Company: {{ $('OpenAI').item.json.message.content.company_name }}
Location: {{ $('OpenAI').item.json.message.content.location }}
Job Description: {{ $('OpenAI').item.json.message.content.job_description }}
Benefits: {{ $('OpenAI').item.json.message.content.benefits }}

Candidate Profile:
"""
Asheesh Ranjan Srivastava
Founder, Quest & Crossfire | AI-Native Builder
Email: asheesh.srivastava@questandcrossfire.com
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/asheesh-ranjan-srivastava
GitHub: github.com/AsheeshSrivatava
Portfolio: questandcrossfire.com

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY:
AI-native builder with 6+ years combining systems thinking with AI collaboration to build products that help people learn and grow. Founder of Quest & Crossfire, currently building AI-powered learning platform while completing MS in Computer Science (AI/ML).

WHAT I BRING:
- Systems Thinking: Trained 400+ professionals, led 10-member teams, scaled programs across 5 states
- AI-Native Development: Shipped 2 production apps in 3 weeks (questandcrossfire.com/obsidian & /chatbot)
- Product Architecture: 85% MVP platform, launching Q1 2026
- Data-Driven Leadership: 6+ years data analysis, MIS design, capacity building

RECENT WORK:
- Built Multi-Persona Chatbot with 4 AI personas, real-time streaming (Live)
- Developed Multi-Model Text Summarization with 83% cost reduction
- Created Obsidian AI Learning Assistant with dual AI providers (Live)
- Building Quest & Crossfire: AI learning platform for Python & AI engineering

TECHNICAL: Python, OpenAI API, Hugging Face, Streamlit, n8n automation, Power BI

APPROACH:
"I architect systems and partner with AI to implement them. I focus on vision, users, and architecture - AI handles implementation. This shipped production platform in 3 weeks vs months."

EXPERIENCE:
- Quest & Crossfire: Founder (2025-Present) - AI learning platform
- Piramal Foundation: Program Leader (2018-2020) - Led teams, trained 400+
- Kaivalya Education: Gandhi Fellow (2016-2018) - Data-driven coaching
- Finish Society: M&E Executive (2021-2022) - Dashboards, MIS

EDUCATION:
- MS Computer Science (AI/ML) - Woolf University (2025-2027)
- Master's Development Studies - IIT Guwahati
- OutSkill AI Engineering Bootcamp 2025

PHILOSOPHY:
Quest & Crossfire tagline: "Small fixes, big clarity" - turning chaos into progress through evolving systems.

AVAILABLE: January 2026
"""
